content:
Walgreens is a great place to check for the Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal travel size. They usually carry a wide range of Pantene products, including travel sizes.

You can visit the Walgreens website or check their store locator to find a location near you. Once you're in the store, head to the hair care section and look for the Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal display. If you don't see the travel size on the shelf, you can always ask a store associate for assistance. They might be able to check if it's in stock or special order it for you.

Additionally, you can also check Walgreens' website or mobile app to see if they offer online shopping with in-store pickup or delivery options. This way, you can purchase the travel size online and pick it up at your convenience or have it delivered to your doorstep.

Fingers crossed you'll be able to find the travel size at Walgreens!
